titles.title: Withholding Tax Relief Act of 2006
A bill to repeal the imposition of withholding on certain payments made to vendors by government entities.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 5/17/2006--Introduced. Withholding Tax Relief Act of 2006 - Repeals provisions of the Tax Increase Prevention and Reconciliation Act of 2005 requiring federal, state, and local governmental entities to withhold 3% of payments due to vendors providing goods and services to such entities.
